div.p: H75/113, unit 805, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
To the Honorable the Chief Secretary.

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate *
of Expenditure during the Quarter ending 31st March 1875.

cell.p:
Total — Two hundred and seventy five pounds
—— shillings and
— pen
